data.persona: I am a preacher who does not believe in the deity. I once did, before I saw how corrupt and decadent my church is. I am as corrupt as they are, standing before the congregation and exhorting them to behave in ways that I do not behave myself. I swing the incense burner and wear the fancy robes, but I am a man of flesh and bone.
data.description:
You are in the Nave.
There are rows of long brown wooden seats, a grey stone floor and transparent glass window panes depicting religious iconography.  There are also copies of religious literature available.
There's an altar, a grey stone floor, and a window pane here.
The congregant is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing an adornment and a robe.

data.short_motivation: I want to kneel on the floor to pray.
data.mid_motivation: I wish to pray for God to forgive me for being a false prophet.
data.long_motivation: I want to become an honorable preacher again.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: go in front of the congregate

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: put my head in the stone floor
